```{r}
library('ggplot2') # visualization
library('ggthemes') # visualization
library('scales') # visualization
library('dplyr') # data manipulation
library('mice') # imputation
library('randomForest') # classification algorithm
library('rSymPy')
library('polynom')
```
```{r}
train <- data.frame(read.csv('~/DS310 Dengue/Data/dengue_features_train.csv', stringsAsFactors = F))
test  <- data.frame(read.csv('~/DS310 Dengue/Data/dengue_features_test.csv', stringsAsFactors = F))
labels <- data.frame(read.csv('~/DS310 Dengue/Data/dengue_labels_train.csv', stringsAsFactors = F))
```
```{r}
trainWithLabels  <- data.frame(cbind(train, labels$total_cases))
trainWithLabels <- trainWithLabels[complete.cases(trainWithLabels), ]
trainIq <- trainWithLabels[trainWithLabels$city == 'iq',]
trainIq <- trainIq[complete.cases(trainIq), ]

trainSJ <- trainWithLabels[trainWithLabels$city == 'sj',]
trainSJ <- trainIq[complete.cases(trainSJ), ]

```
